response.overview: A middle-aged man, Pieter, lives a lonely life. As he watches home videos from long ago, he mourns the loss of his wife and son. If he could put aside his traditional views on life, he might have been a better father to his only child. One together revolves around themes such as gender identity and acceptance and how love and compassion can heal old wounds and reunite people.
response.title: Een Saam
